title: ini enna bhayam
sahitya:
ini enna bhayam enna bhayam enakku Ishan karuNai kiDaittadu pUraNam


anupallavi

  tanimaiyenreNNi daraNiyil varundEn panimalai nAthan en pakkattiliruukkirAn


caraNam    varumiDaranaittum vErODE koivAn taruNam arindE taDuttATkoLvAn
 karuvil uyir kAkkum kAlakAlan en hrdayAmbujamadil niraivAsam koNDAn
